title: threat-actor
description: Threat Actors are actual individuals, groups, or organizations believed to be operating with malicious intent.

type.description: The type of this object, which MUST be the literal `threat-actor`.

threat_actor_types.description: This field specifies the type of threat actor. Open Vocab - threat-actor-type-ov

name.description: A name used to identify this Threat Actor or Threat Actor group.

description.description: A description that provides more details and context about the Threat Actor.

aliases.description: A list of other names that this Threat Actor is believed to use.

roles.description: This is a list of roles the Threat Actor plays. Open Vocab - threat-actor-role-ov

goals.description: The high level goals of this Threat Actor, namely, what are they trying to do.

first_seen.description: The time that this Threat Actor was first seen.

last_seen.description: The time that this Threat Actor was last seen.

sophistication.description: The skill, specific knowledge, special training, or expertise a Threat Actor must have to perform the attack. Open Vocab - threat-actor-sophistication-ov

resource_level.description: This defines the organizational level at which this Threat Actor typically works. Open Vocab - attack-resource-level-ov

primary_motivation.description: The primary reason, motivation, or purpose behind this Threat Actor. Open Vocab - attack-motivation-ov

secondary_motivations.description: The secondary reasons, motivations, or purposes behind this Threat Actor. Open Vocab - attack-motivation-ov

personal_motivations.description: The personal reasons, motivations, or purposes of the Threat Actor regardless of organizational goals. Open Vocab - attack-motivation-ov
